About Tabletop Whale

Tabletop Whale is a tiny blog run by a designer in Seattle. It's updated every two to three weeks with a science themed infographic, chart, or illustration.

Say Hi!

Questions? Comments? Feel free to shoot me an email or find me on Twitter. I also have accounts on Dribbble and Behance.

© 2014 Eleanor Lutz
